title: Bug 2736Performance: Task list delta listener should use visitor (1GITCP0)
description: TaskListContentProvider.getMarkerDeltas is a recursive method that walks overtree deltas and gathers the set of marker changes.We will soon be making someoptimizations to the delta visitor code, so it will soon be more efficient to use a visitorthan to walk over the delta yourself.The visitor interface is IResourceDeltaVisitor, andyou would call accept() on the top level delta passed into TaskListContentProvider.resourceChanged.NOTES:
